parameters.lawResourceId: [if(parameters('createNewLogAnalyticsWS'), createObject('value', reference(extensionResourceId(format('/subscriptions/{0}/resourceGroups/{1}', parameters('subscriptionId'), parameters('resourceGroupName')), 'Microsoft.Resources/deployments', format('logAnalytics-Deployment-{0}-{1}', parameters('location'), parameters('instanceName'))), '2022-09-01').outputs.lawresourceid.value), createObject('value', parameters('existingLogAnalyticsWSId')))]

properties.description: Data collection rule for workload discovery.

metadata.description: The name of the function app.
The new application settings to be added or updated.

api.name: keyvault
api.description: Azure Key Vault is a service to securely store and access secrets.

content.json: # Azure Monitor Starter Packs - Extended Admin Centre - V3.0 (Beta)

## General Parameters

### Subscriptions

Select the Subscriptions that will be used in the Configuration

### Logic App

Select the logic app to be used. Typically the shoulbe a single one but if more instances exist, select the one for the instance you want to use.

### Function Apps

Select the Backend Function to be used. Typically the shoulbe a single one but if more instances exist, select the one for the instance you want to use.

### Config Function Key

This field will be automatically populated once the function is selected.

### Workspace

Select the Log Analytics Workspace to be used for this instance.

### Azure Managed Grafana

Select the Azure Managed Grafana if you have deployed one along with the solution.

parameters.name: instanceName
parameters.label: Instance
parameters.query:
resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.web/sites' and ['kind'] =~ 'functionapp'
| where isnotempty(tags.MonitorStarterPacksComponents)
| project instanceNames=tags.instanceName

parameters.name: FunctionApps
parameters.label: Function Apps
parameters.description: Select the function to provide the access key.
parameters.query:
resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.web/sites' and ['kind'] =~ 'functionapp'
| where isnotempty(tags.MonitorStarterPacksComponents)
| where tags.instanceName == '{instanceName}'
| project id,name

parameters.name: configKey
parameters.label: Config Function Key
parameters.description: The function key is fetched automatically from the function selected on the left.

parameters.name: Workspace
parameters.label: WorkSpace
parameters.query:
resources
| where type == "microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces"
| where tags.instanceName =~ '{instanceName}'
| project id

parameters.name: logicAppResource
parameters.label: Logic App
parameters.query:
resources
| where type == "microsoft.logic/workflows" 
| where isnotempty(tags.MonitorStarterPacksComponents)
| where tags.instanceName =~ '{instanceName}'
| project Id=id, Name=name

parameters.name: GrafanaInstance
parameters.label: Azure Managed Grafana
parameters.description: Select an Azure Managed Grafana instance, if available.
parameters.query:
resources
| where type =~ "microsoft.dashboard/grafana"
| where isnotempty(tags.monitorStarterPacksComponents) or isnotempty(tags.MonitorStarterPacksComponents)
| where tags.instanceName == '{instanceName}'
| project id, label=properties.endpoint

parameters.name: DefaultAG
parameters.label: Default Action Group
parameters.query:
resources
| where type == "microsoft.insights/actiongroups"
| where properties.enabled == 'true'
| project id

parameters.name: appInsightsName
parameters.query:
resources
| where type == "microsoft.insights/components"
| where name == "{FunctionApps:name}"
| project id

content.query:
resources
| where (isnotempty(tags.MonitorStarterPacks) or isnotempty(tags.MonitorStarterPacksComponents)) and (tags.instanceName == '{instanceName}')
|union ( 
policyresources | where isnotempty(properties.metadata.MonitorStarterPacks))
| summarize count() by type, tostring(tags.instanceName)
| sort by count_ desc
content.title: Monitoring Packs resources and Components

content.query: {"version":"CustomEndpoint/1.0","data":null,"headers":[{"key":"x-functions-key","value":"{configKey}"}],"method":"GET","url":"https://{FunctionApps:name}.azurewebsites.net/api/config?Action=getSupportedServices","contentType":"text/plain","urlParams":[{"key":"","value":""}],"transformers":null}

content.json: # Getting Started ## Instance: {instanceName} Welcome to the Azure Monitoring Packs. This workbook was designed to help you configuring the solution. Here you can: - Enable/Disable monitoring packs for one or more VMs or services. You may also disable all the monitoring for a specific server or service. This will remove the tags and the rule associations. For services, right now, the alerts won´t be deleted by themselves. - Enable/Disable Alerts in bulk. You can also assign a different Action group to one or more alerts or delete the rules** - Check policy status and start remediation if required. By clicking in a policy, you can also assign that policy to another scope. - Check Monitor pack associations. - Review discovered applications (VMs only) - Manage agent configuration (install/remove) ## Link to your managed [Grafana]({GrafanaInstance:label}) instance, if you enabled it. Make sure to property set permissions before attemping to access it. ## If this is the first time using this solution, please configure the parameters in the ***Configuration*** tab and save the workbook for proper functionality. ## Please check the Monitoring Packs repository for updates. [Azure MONitor STARter Packs](http://github.com/Azure/AzureMonitorStarterPacks) ## Also check the Azure Monitor Baseline Alerts ([AMBA](http://aka.ms/amba)) website for the details on the alerts.

## Active Alerts List

This tab shows all Monitoring Packs related alerts that are currently active.

parameters.name: alertsInstance
parameters.label: Instance
parameters.query:
resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.web/sites' and ['kind'] =~ 'functionapp'
| where isnotempty(tags.MonitorStarterPacksComponents)
| project instanceNames=tags.instanceName

content.query:
alertsmanagementresources
| where ['type'] == 'microsoft.alertsmanagement/alerts'
| project ['Alert Id']=id,resourceId=properties.context.context.resourceId, alertRule=tolower(tostring(properties.essentials.alertRule)), status=properties.context.status,severity=properties.context.context.severity
| where isnotempty(alertRule)
| join (resources
| where type == "microsoft.insights/scheduledqueryrules" or type =="microsoft.insights/metricalerts" or type == 'microsoft.insights/activitylogalerts'
| where isnotempty(tags.MonitorStarterPacks) and tags.instanceName in ({alertsInstance})
| extend alertRule=tolower(tostring(['id']))) on alertRule
| project id, ['Alert Name']=name,['Details']=['Alert Id'], Status=status, Resource=resourceId, Sev=severity
| where Status=='Activated'
content.title: Active Alerts

content.query:
alertsmanagementresources
| where ['type'] == 'microsoft.alertsmanagement/alerts'
| project ['Alert Id']=id,resourceId=properties.context.context.resourceId, alertRule=tolower(tostring(properties.essentials.alertRule)), status=properties.context.status
| where isnotempty(alertRule)
| join (resources
| where type == "microsoft.insights/scheduledqueryrules" or type =="microsoft.insights/metricalerts" or type == 'microsoft.insights/activitylogalerts'
| where isnotempty(tags.MonitorStarterPacks) and tags.instanceName in ({alertsInstance})
| extend alertRule=tolower(tostring(['id']))) on alertRule
| summarize count() by AlertType=type

content.json:
## IaaS Information

The summary below shows details related to the IaaS Monitoring packs.

content.query:
resources | where type =~ 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines' or type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines'
| extend MonitorStatus=iff(isnotempty(tostring(tags.MonitorStarterPacks)),'Monitored','Not Monitored')
| summarize count() by MonitorStatus
content.title: Monitoring Status (Tags)

content.query:
Resources
| where type == 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines'
| extend
    JoinID = toupper(id)
| join kind=leftouter(
    Resources
    | where ( type == 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines/extensions') and name in ('AzureMonitorLinuxAgent', 'AzureMonitorWindowsAgent')
    | extend
        VMId = toupper(substring(id, 0, indexof(id, '/extensions'))),
        ExtensionName = name
) on $left.JoinID == $right.VMId
| union (Resources
| where type == 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines'
| extend
    JoinID = toupper(id)
| join kind=leftouter(
    Resources
    | where type == 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines/extensions' and name in ('AzureMonitorLinuxAgent', 'AzureMonitorWindowsAgent')
    | extend
        VMId = toupper(substring(id, 0, indexof(id, '/extensions'))),
        ExtensionName = name
) on $left.JoinID == $right.VMId)
| summarize count() by AgentInstalled=iff(isempty(ExtensionName),"No","Yes")
content.title: Agent Install Status

content.query:
insightsresources
| where type == "microsoft.insights/datacollectionruleassociations"
| extend resourceId=split(id,'/providers/Microsoft.Insights/')[0]
| where isnotnull(properties.dataCollectionRuleId)
| project rulename=tostring(split(properties.dataCollectionRuleId,"/")[8]),resourceName=tostring(split(resourceId,"/")[8]),resourceId//ruleId=properties.dataCollectionRuleId
| join (resources
| where type == "microsoft.insights/datacollectionrules"
| extend MPs=tostring(['tags'].MonitorStarterPacks)
| where isnotempty(MPs) //or properties.dataSources.performanceCounters[0].name == 'VMInsightsPerfCounters'
| summarize by Pack=MPs,rulename=tostring(name)) on rulename
| project-away rulename,rulename1,resourceId
| summarize Associated=count() by Pack
| sort by Pack asc
content.title: Servers/Pack (Association)

content.query:
insightsresources
| where type == "microsoft.insights/datacollectionruleassociations"
| extend resourceId=split(id,'/providers/Microsoft.Insights/')[0]
| where isnotnull(properties.dataCollectionRuleId)
| project rulename=tostring(split(properties.dataCollectionRuleId,"/")[8]),resourceName=tostring(split(resourceId,"/")[8]),resourceId//ruleId=properties.dataCollectionRuleId
| join (resources
| where type == "microsoft.insights/datacollectionrules"
| extend MPs=tostring(['tags'].MonitorStarterPacks)
| where isnotempty(MPs) //or properties.dataSources.performanceCounters[0].name == 'VMInsightsPerfCounters'
| summarize by Pack=MPs,rulename=tostring(name)) on rulename
| project-away rulename,rulename1,resourceId
| summarize Tagged=count() by Pack
| sort by Pack asc
content.title: Tagged Resources per Tag

content.query:
insightsresources
| where type == "microsoft.insights/datacollectionruleassociations"
| extend resourceId=split(id,'/providers/Microsoft.Insights/')[0]
| where isnotnull(properties.dataCollectionRuleId)
| project rulename=tostring(split(properties.dataCollectionRuleId,"/")[8]),resourceName=tostring(split(resourceId,"/")[8]),resourceId//ruleId=properties.dataCollectionRuleId
| join (resources
| where type == "microsoft.insights/datacollectionrules"
| extend MPs=tostring(['tags'].MonitorStarterPacks)
| where isnotempty(MPs) //or properties.dataSources.performanceCounters[0].name == 'VMInsightsPerfCounters'
| summarize by Pack=MPs,rulename=tostring(name)) on rulename
| project-away rulename,rulename1,resourceId
| summarize Associated=count() by Pack
| sort by Pack asc
content.title: Associated Servers per Pack

content.query: {"version":"CustomEndpoint/1.0","data":null,"headers":[{"key":"x-functions-key","value":"{configKey}"}],"method":"GET","url":"https://{FunctionApps:name}.azurewebsites.net/api/config?Action=getSupportedServices&Type=PaaS","contentType":"text/plain","urlParams":[{"key":"","value":""}],"transformers":null}

resources
| where tolower(type) in ("microsoft.insights/metricalerts")
| where isnotempty(tags.MonitorStarterPacks)
| project nameSpace=tolower(strcat(tostring(split(properties.scopes[0],"/")[-3]),"/",tostring(split(properties.scopes[0],"/")[-2]))),Target=split(properties.scopes[0],"/")[-1]
| union (resources
| where tolower(type) in ("microsoft.insights/activitylogalerts")
| where isnotempty(tags.MonitorStarterPacks)
| project nameSpace=tolower(strcat(tostring(split(properties.scopes[0],"/")[-3]),"/",tostring(split(properties.scopes[0],"/")[-2]))),Target=split(properties.scopes[0],"/")[-1])
| distinct tostring(Target),nameSpace
| summarize Total=count() by nameSpace

content.json:
## Server Monitoring Setup

Select servers on the right to assign a pack. Once the backend is done with the assigning, the server will show on the left side grid.

On the left side grid, the monitoring can be updated to add more packs, as well as to remove a specific pack or remove any monitoring altogether from the server.
When Monitoring is first enabled, the Azure Monitoring Agent will also be installed to the selected servers.

content.query:
insightsresources
| where type == "microsoft.insights/datacollectionruleassociations"
| extend resourceId=split(id,'/providers/Microsoft.Insights/')[0]
| where isnotnull(properties.dataCollectionRuleId)
| project rulename=tostring(split(properties.dataCollectionRuleId,"/")[8]),resourceName=tostring(split(resourceId,"/")[8]),resourceId=tolower(tostring(resourceId))//ruleId=properties.dataCollectionRuleId
| join kind= inner  (
resources
| where type == "microsoft.insights/datacollectionrules"
| extend MPs=tostring(['tags'].MonitorStarterPacks)
| where isnotempty(MPs) //or properties.dataSources.performanceCounters[0].name == 'VMInsightsPerfCounters'
| where MPs !in~ ('WinDisc', 'LxDisc')
| summarize by Pack=MPs,rulename=tostring(name)) on rulename
| summarize by resourceId, Pack
| summarize Packs=tostring(make_list(Pack)) by resourceId
| project Packs2=tostring(Packs), resourceId

resources | where type =~ 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines' 
| extend MP=tolower(tags.MonitorStarterPacks), instanceName=tolower(tags.instanceName)
| where isnotempty(MP) and instanceName == '{instanceName}' 
| project Resource=id,['Resource Group']=resourceGroup,Packs=tags.MonitorStarterPacks, OS=properties.osType, subscriptionId, Location=location
| union (resources | where type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines' 
| extend MP=tolower(tags.MonitorStarterPacks), instanceName=tolower(tags.instanceName)
| where isnotempty(MP) and instanceName == '{instanceName}' and (tolower(tags.Vendor) != 'databricks')
| project Resource=id,['Resource Group']=resourceGroup,Packs=tags.MonitorStarterPacks, OS=properties.storageProfile.osDisk.osType, subscriptionId, Location=location)

content.query:
resources | where type =~ 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines' | where isempty(tolower(tags.MonitorStarterPacks))
| project Resource=id,['Resource Group']=resourceGroup, OS=properties.osType, subscriptionId, Location=location
| union (resources | where type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines' 
| where isempty(tolower(tags.MonitorStarterPacks)) 
| project Resource=id,['Resource Group']=resourceGroup, OS=properties.storageProfile.osDisk.osType, subscriptionId, Location=location)
| union (resources | where type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachinescalesets' and properties.orchestrationMode == 'Uniform'
| where isempty(tolower(tags.MonitorStarterPacks)) 
| project Resource=id,['Resource Group']=resourceGroup, OS=properties.virtualMachineProfile.storageProfile.osDisk.osType, subscriptionId, Location=location)
| join kind= leftouter  (
    resourcecontainers| where type =~ 'microsoft.resources/subscriptions'
    | project Subscription=name,subscriptionId
    ) 
on subscriptionId| project-away subscriptionId, subscriptionId1
content.title: Non-monitored Machines

On the left side grid, the monitoring can be updated to remove a specific pack from the service.

content.json:
## Alerts Configuration

### Select a pack on the left to visualize the alerts rules related to those packs. Select the Other Alerts tab to visualiza any other alert rule that is not related to the packs.

parameters.name: AlertPack
parameters.query:
resources
| where tolower(type) in ("microsoft.insights/scheduledqueryrules", "microsoft.insights/metricalerts","microsoft.insights/activitylogalerts")
| where isnotempty(tags.MonitorStarterPacks)
| project MPs=tostring(tags.MonitorStarterPacks)
| summarize by MPs

content.query:
resources
| where tolower(type) in ("microsoft.insights/scheduledqueryrules")
| where isnotempty(tags.MonitorStarterPacks)
| project id,MP=tags.MonitorStarterPacks, Enabled=properties.enabled, Description=properties.description, ['Action Group']=split(properties.actions.actionGroups[0],"/")[8], location, Target=split(properties.scopes[0],"/")[-1]
| union (
resources
| where tolower(type) in ("microsoft.insights/metricalerts")
| where isnotempty(tags.MonitorStarterPacks)
| project id,MP=tags.MonitorStarterPacks, Enabled=properties.enabled, Description=properties.description, ['Action Group']=split(properties.actions[0].actionGroupId,"/")[8], location, Target=split(properties.scopes[0],"/")[-1])
| union (resources
| where tolower(type) in ("microsoft.insights/activitylogalerts")
| where isnotempty(tags.MonitorStarterPacks)
| where tags.instanceName == '{instanceName}'
| project id,MP=tags.MonitorStarterPacks, Enabled=properties.enabled, Description=properties.description, ['Action Group']=split(properties.actions.actionGroups[0].actionGroupId,"/")[8], location, Target=split(properties.scopes[0],"/")[-1])
| where MP=='{AlertPack}'

content.query:
resources
| where ['type'] =~ 'microsoft.insights/datacollectionrules'
| mv-expand datasources=properties.dataSources.performanceCounters
| where isnotnull(datasources)
| mv-expand  cs=datasources.counterSpecifiers //=~ '\\VmInsights\\DetailedMetrics'
| where cs =~'\\VmInsights\\DetailedMetrics'
| join kind=inner  (insightsresources
| where type == "microsoft.insights/datacollectionruleassociations"
| where isnotnull(properties.dataCollectionRuleId)
| extend sourceResourceId=tostring(split(id,'/providers/Microsoft.Insights/')[0])
| extend serverName=tostring(sourceResourceId), dataCollectionRuleId=tostring(properties.dataCollectionRuleId)) on $left.id == $right.dataCollectionRuleId
| project serverName=sourceResourceId, name
| summarize VMInsightsAssociations=count(name) by ['Server Name']=serverName
content.title: Servers and DCR associations

tooltipFormat.tooltip: If more than one VMInsights association is found, there may be data duplication to one or more Log Analytics workspaces.

content.query:
resources
| where ['type'] =~ 'microsoft.insights/datacollectionrules'
| mv-expand datasources=properties.dataSources.performanceCounters
| where isnotnull(datasources)
| mv-expand  cs=datasources.counterSpecifiers //=~ '\\VmInsights\\DetailedMetrics'
| where cs =~'\\VmInsights\\DetailedMetrics'
| join kind=leftouter   (insightsresources
| where type == "microsoft.insights/datacollectionruleassociations"
| where isnotnull(properties.dataCollectionRuleId)
| extend sourceResourceId=tostring(split(id,'/providers/Microsoft.Insights/')[0])
| extend serverName=tostring(split(sourceResourceId,'/')[8]), dataCollectionRuleId=tostring(properties.dataCollectionRuleId)) on $left.id == $right.dataCollectionRuleId
| where sourceResourceId=~'{vmiSelectedServer}'
| summarize by DCRId=dataCollectionRuleId
content.title: Details for {vmiSelectedServer}

tooltipFormat.tooltip: If more than one VMInsights association is found, there may be data duplication to one or more Log Analytics workspaces.

content.query:
resources
| where ['type'] =~ 'microsoft.insights/datacollectionrules'
| mv-expand datasources=properties.dataSources.performanceCounters
| where isnotnull(datasources)
| mv-expand  cs=datasources.counterSpecifiers //=~ '\\VmInsights\\DetailedMetrics'
| where cs =~'\\VmInsights\\DetailedMetrics'
| join kind=inner   (insightsresources
| where type == "microsoft.insights/datacollectionruleassociations"
| where isnotnull(properties.dataCollectionRuleId)
| extend sourceResourceId=tostring(split(id,'/providers/Microsoft.Insights/')[0])
| extend serverName=tostring(split(sourceResourceId,'/')[8]), dataCollectionRuleId=tostring(properties.dataCollectionRuleId)) on $left.id == $right.dataCollectionRuleId
| project serverName, dataCollectionRuleId
| summarize Servers=count(serverName) by DCRId=dataCollectionRuleId
content.title: VMInsights DCRs and Servers

content.query:
resources
| where ['type'] =~ 'microsoft.insights/datacollectionrules'
| mv-expand datasources=properties.dataSources.performanceCounters
| where isnotnull(datasources)
| mv-expand  cs=datasources.counterSpecifiers //=~ '\\VmInsights\\DetailedMetrics'
| where cs =~'\\VmInsights\\DetailedMetrics'
| join kind=leftouter   (insightsresources
| where type == "microsoft.insights/datacollectionruleassociations"
| where isnotnull(properties.dataCollectionRuleId)
| extend sourceResourceId=tostring(split(id,'/providers/Microsoft.Insights/')[0])
| extend serverName=tostring(split(sourceResourceId,'/')[8]), dataCollectionRuleId=tostring(properties.dataCollectionRuleId)) on $left.id == $right.dataCollectionRuleId
| where dataCollectionRuleId=='{VMIdataCollectionRuleId}'
| project ['Server Name']=sourceResourceId
content.title: Associated Servers

tooltipFormat.tooltip: If more than one VMInsights association is found, there may be data duplication to one or more Log Analytics workspaces.

items.name: query - VM Insights per DCR - Copy

content.query:
resources
| where type == "microsoft.insights/datacollectionrules"
| extend MPs=tostring(['tags'].MonitorStarterPacks)
| where isnotempty(MPs) //or properties.dataSources.performanceCounters[0].name == 'VMInsightsPerfCounters'
| summarize by Pack=MPs,rulename=tostring(name)
| join (insightsresources
| where type == "microsoft.insights/datacollectionruleassociations"
| extend resourceId=split(id,'/providers/Microsoft.Insights/')[0]
| where isnotnull(properties.dataCollectionRuleId)
| project rulename=tostring(split(properties.dataCollectionRuleId,"/")[8]),resourceName=tostring(split(resourceId,"/")[8]),resourceId//ruleId=properties.dataCollectionRuleId
) on rulename
| project-away rulename1,resourceId
| summarize Associated=count() by Pack, rulename
| order by Pack asc
content.title: Select Pack to see associated Machines

content.query:
insightsresources
| where type == "microsoft.insights/datacollectionruleassociations"
| extend resourceId=split(id,'/providers/Microsoft.Insights/')[0]
| where isnotnull(properties.dataCollectionRuleId)
| project rulename=split(properties.dataCollectionRuleId,"/")[8],resourceName=split(resourceId,"/")[8],resourceId//ruleId=properties.dataCollectionRuleId
| where '{selectedRule}'==rulename
content.title: Associated Machines

content.query:
resources
| where type == "microsoft.insights/datacollectionrules"
| where isnotempty(tags.MonitorStarterPacks)
| extend ds=properties.dataSources
| project id,Type=kind, location,syslog=ds.syslog[0].streams[0], windowsEventLogs=ds.windowsEventLogs[0].streams[0], logsettings=ds.logFiles[0].name,iislogs=ds.iisLogs[0].name,performanceCounters=ds.performanceCounters[0].streams[0],
dataCollectionEndpointId=properties.dataCollectionEndpointId,transformKql=properties.dataFlows[0].transformKql,workspaceResourceId=properties.destinations.logAnalytics[0].workspaceResourceId,State=properties.provisioningState
content.title: List of Currently Configured Data Collection Rules

bladeOpenContext.bladeJsonParameters:

	"workspaceResourceId" : "{workspace}",

	},

}

content.query:
Resources
| where type == 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines' and tolower(tags.Vendor) != 'databricks'
| extend
    JoinID = toupper(id),
    OSType = tostring(properties.storageProfile.osDisk.osType)
| join kind=leftouter(
    Resources
    | where ( type == 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines/extensions') and name in ('AzureMonitorLinuxAgent', 'AzureMonitorWindowsAgent')
    | extend
        State= tolower(properties.provisioningState),
        VMId = toupper(substring(id, 0, indexof(id, '/extensions'))),
        ExtensionName = name,
        UpgradeEnabled =  tostring(properties.enableAutomaticUpgrade)
) on $left.JoinID == $right.VMId
| join kind=leftouter(
    Resources
    | where ( type == 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines/extensions') and name in ('DependencyAgentWindows','DependencyAgentLinux')
    | extend
        State= tolower(properties.provisioningState),
        VMId = toupper(substring(id, 0, indexof(id, '/extensions'))),
        DepAgent = name,
        UpgradeEnabled =  tostring(properties.enableAutomaticUpgrade)
) on $left.JoinID == $right.VMId
| union (Resources
| where type == 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines' and tolower(tags.Vendor) != 'databricks'
| extend
    JoinID = toupper(id),
    OSType = tostring(properties.osType)
| join kind=leftouter(
    Resources
    | where type == 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines/extensions' and name in ('AzureMonitorLinuxAgent', 'AzureMonitorWindowsAgent')
    | extend
        State= tolower(properties.provisioningState),
        VMId = toupper(substring(id, 0, indexof(id, '/extensions'))),
        ExtensionName = name,
        UpgradeEnabled =  tostring(properties.enableAutomaticUpgrade)
) on $left.JoinID == $right.VMId
| join kind=leftouter(
    Resources
    | where type == 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines/extensions' and name in ('DependencyAgentWindows','DependencyAgentLinux')
    | extend
        State= tolower(properties.provisioningState),
        VMId = toupper(substring(id, 0, indexof(id, '/extensions'))),
        DepAgent = name,
        UpgradeEnabled =  tostring(properties.enableAutomaticUpgrade)
) on $left.JoinID == $right.VMId)
| summarize by id, OSType, ['Dependency Agent']=iff(isempty(DepAgent),'N/A',DepAgent),ExtensionName=iff(isempty(ExtensionName),'N/A',ExtensionName), ['AMA State']=State, ['AMA Upg']=UpgradeEnabled,['Subscription']=subscriptionId,['Resource Group']=resourceGroup, location
| extend Install=iff(ExtensionName=='N/A','Install',iff(['AMA State']<> 'succeeded','Unhealthy','')), Uninstall=iff((ExtensionName<>'N/A') and (['AMA State'] == 'succeeded'),'Uninstall',iff(['AMA State'] <> 'succeeded','Warning',''))
content.title: Agent Install Status

armActionContext.description:
# Installing agent(s) for the following machine(s):

{vmstoinstall}

armActionContext.description:

armActionContext.title: Remove Agent

content.query:
Resources
| where type == 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines'
| extend
    JoinID = toupper(id),
    OSName = tostring(properties.osProfile.computerName),
    OSType = tostring(properties.storageProfile.osDisk.osType)
| join kind=leftouter(
    Resources
    | where ( type == 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines/extensions') and name in ('AzureMonitorLinuxAgent', 'AzureMonitorWindowsAgent')
    | extend
        VMId = toupper(substring(id, 0, indexof(id, '/extensions'))),
        ExtensionName = name
) on $left.JoinID == $right.VMId
| union (Resources
| where type == 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines'
| extend
    JoinID = toupper(id),
    OSName = tostring(properties.osProfile.computerName),
    OSType = tostring(properties.osType)
| join kind=leftouter(
    Resources
    | where type == 'microsoft.hybridcompute/machines/extensions' and name in ('AzureMonitorLinuxAgent', 'AzureMonitorWindowsAgent')
    | extend
        VMId = toupper(substring(id, 0, indexof(id, '/extensions'))),
        ExtensionName = name
) on $left.JoinID == $right.VMId)
| extend ExtensionName = iff(isnotempty(ExtensionName),ExtensionName, "NotInstalled")
| summarize count() by ExtensionName
| sort by ExtensionName asc
content.title: Agent Install Status

content.query:
Heartbeat | where Category == "Azure Monitor Agent"
| summarize arg_max(TimeGenerated, *) by Computer
| project  Computer,LastHeartbeat=TimeGenerated, ['SecondsAgo']=datetime_diff('second',now(),TimeGenerated)
| sort by SecondsAgo asc
content.title: Last Heartbeat (24 hours)

content.query:
resources
| where type =~ "microsoft.compute/virtualmachines"
| mvexpand with_itemindex=i apps=properties.applicationProfile.galleryApplications
| where apps != ''
| extend splitFields = split(apps.packageReferenceId, '/')
| extend Gallery = strcat('/',strcat_array(array_slice(splitFields, 1, 8), '/'))
| project Computer=id, ['Application Version']=tostring(apps.packageReferenceId), Gallery
| summarize by Gallery,['Application Version'], Computer
| sort by Gallery asc
content.title: Client Status (VM Applications)
Auto Discovery Prototype - Use with caution.

content.json: When Discovery is first enabled, the Azure Monitoring Agent will also be installed to the selected servers along with a VM Application agent to collect discovery data. Data will be sent to the Log Analytics agent.

content.query:
insightsresources
| where type == "microsoft.insights/datacollectionruleassociations"
| extend resourceId=split(id,'/providers/Microsoft.Insights/')[0]
| where isnotnull(properties.dataCollectionRuleId)
| project rulename=tostring(split(properties.dataCollectionRuleId,"/")[8]),resourceName=tostring(split(resourceId,"/")[8]),resourceId=tostring(resourceId)//ruleId=properties.dataCollectionRuleId
| join kind= inner  (
resources
| where type == "microsoft.insights/datacollectionrules"
| extend MPs=tostring(['tags'].MonitorStarterPacks), instanceName = ['tags'].instanceName
| where instanceName == '{instanceName}'
| where isnotempty(MPs) and (MPs =~ 'WinDisc' or MPs =~ 'LxDisc')//or properties.dataSources.performanceCounters[0].name == 'VMInsightsPerfCounters'
| summarize by Pack=MPs,rulename=tostring(name)) on rulename
| summarize by resourceId, Pack
| summarize Packs=make_list(Pack) by resourceId

resources | where type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines' 
| extend MPs=tostring(['tags'].MonitorStarterPacks), instanceName = ['tags'].instanceName
| where instanceName == '{instanceName}'
| where isnotempty(MPs) and (MPs contains 'WinDisc' or MPs contains 'LxDisc')
| extend Packs = iff(MPs contains 'WinDisc','WinDisc','LxDisc')
| project Resource=id,['Resource Group']=resourceGroup,Packs, OS=properties.storageProfile.osDisk.osType, subscriptionId, Location=location

{"version":"Merge/1.0","merges":[{"id":"964f21b6-ee11-43c6-a6e2-4119d566812c","mergeType":"outer","leftTable":"query - taggedVMs","rightTable":"query - associatedVMs","leftColumn":"Resource","rightColumn":"resourceId"}],"projectRename":[{"originalName":"[query - taggedVMs].Resource","mergedName":"Resource","fromId":"964f21b6-ee11-43c6-a6e2-4119d566812c"},{"originalName":"[query - taggedVMs].Resource Group","mergedName":"Resource Group","fromId":"964f21b6-ee11-43c6-a6e2-4119d566812c"},{"originalName":"[query - taggedVMs].Packs","mergedName":"Packs","fromId":"964f21b6-ee11-43c6-a6e2-4119d566812c"},{"originalName":"[query - taggedVMs].OS","mergedName":"OS","fromId":"964f21b6-ee11-43c6-a6e2-4119d566812c"},{"originalName":"[query - taggedVMs].Location","mergedName":"Location","fromId":"964f21b6-ee11-43c6-a6e2-4119d566812c"},{"originalName":"[query - taggedVMs].Subscription","mergedName":"Subscription","fromId":"964f21b6-ee11-43c6-a6e2-4119d566812c"},{"originalName":"[query - associatedVMs].Packs","mergedName":"Associated","fromId":"964f21b6-ee11-43c6-a6e2-4119d566812c"},{"originalName":"[query - taggedVMs].subscriptionId","mergedName":"subscriptionId","fromId":"unknown"},{"originalName":"[query - associatedVMs].resourceId"}]}
content.title: Discoverable Machines

armActionContext.title: Remove Monitoring
armActionContext.description:
# Please confirm the change.

Remove Monitoring for Discovery Pack(s) 

Servers:

{taggedVMsDiscovery}

content.query:
resources | where type =~ 'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines' 
| extend MPs=tostring(['tags'].MonitorStarterPacks)
| where isempty(MPs) or (MPs notcontains 'WinDisc' and MPs notcontains 'LxDisc')//and subscriptionId in split('{Subscriptions:subscriptionId}',',')
| project Resource=id,['Resource Group']=resourceGroup, OS=properties.storageProfile.osDisk.osType, Subscription=subscriptionId, Location=location
| extend Pack=iff(OS=~'Windows',"WinDisc", "LxDisc")
content.title: Non-discoverable Machines

armActionContext.title: Enable Monitoring Packs
Rmediate policies
armActionContext.description:
# Please confirm remediation

This button will trigger a global policy remeadiation. 

The backend script will go through the policies and initiatives, finding the ones that are not compliant, and will trigger remediation. 

It is not restricted to the ones in this screen.

armActionContext.title: Check Policy Compliance
armActionContext.description: # Please confirm the scan.

content.json:
## Policy Compliance Check
This task will trigger a tenant wide check for policy compliance.

## Policy Remediation

This Task will trigger remediation for the policies in the list that are considered not compliant at this time.

parameters.name: ComputerDiscovery
parameters.label: Select Server
parameters.query:
Discovery_CL
| parse RawData with timestamp "," rest1
| extend Computer=_ResourceId,timestamp=todatetime(timestamp)
| summarize by tostring(Computer)

content.query:
//let maxts=
let maxts=Discovery_CL
| project timestamp=todatetime(tostring(split(RawData,",")[0])), _ResourceId
| where isnotempty(timestamp) and _ResourceId =~ '{ComputerDiscovery}'
| summarize maxts=max(timestamp);
Discovery_CL
| extend Computer=_ResourceId
| where Computer =~ '{ComputerDiscovery}'
| extend fields=split(RawData,",")
| extend timestamp=todatetime(fields[0])
| extend type=tostring(fields[1])
| extend platform=tostring(fields[2])
| extend package=iff (platform =~ 'linux', tostring(fields[4]),'')
| extend name=iff (platform =~ 'linux', tostring(fields[3]), tostring(fields[3]))
| extend othertype=tostring(fields[5])
| extend vendor=tostring(fields[6])
| extend OSVersion=iff(platform =~ 'linux', '',tostring(fields[3]))
| where timestamp == toscalar(maxts)
| project timestamp,Computer,type,name,platform,OSVersion,othertype,vendor
content.title: All Discovery Data

content.query:
let maxts=DiscoveryResults_CL
| summarize maxts=max(TimeGenerated);
DiscoveryResults_CL
| where TimeGenerated == toscalar(maxts)
| project Resource=ResourceId, OS, Pack=Tag, Location, ['Discovery Time']=TimeGenerated
content.title: Discovery Results

armActionContext.title: Enable Monitoring

parameters.name: FunctionApp
parameters.label: Function App
parameters.query:
requests
| project
    timestamp,
    id,
    operation_Name,
    success,
    resultCode,
    duration,
    operation_Id,
    cloud_RoleName,
    invocationId=customDimensions['InvocationId']
| order by timestamp desc
| take 20
| summarize by Functions=operation_Name

content.query:
requests
| project
    timestamp,
    id,
    operation_Name,
    success,
    resultCode,
    duration,
    operation_Id,
    cloud_RoleName,
    invocationId=customDimensions['InvocationId']
| where operation_Name =~ '{FunctionApp}'
| order by timestamp desc
| take 20
content.title: Invocations

content.query:
union traces
| union exceptions
| where operation_Id == '{operationid}'
| where customDimensions['InvocationId'] == '{invocationid}'
| order by timestamp asc
| project
    timestamp,
    message = iff(message != '', message, iff(innermostMessage != '', innermostMessage, customDimensions.[strcat('prop__{','OriginalFormat}')])),
    logLevel = customDimensions.['LogLevel']
content.title: Invocation Details

content.query: {"version":"CustomEndpoint/1.0","data":null,"headers":[{"key":"x-functions-key","value":"{configKey}"}],"method":"GET","url":"https://{FunctionApps:name}.azurewebsites.net/api/config?Action=getdiscoveryresults","contentType":"text/plain","urlParams":[{"key":"WSId","value":"{Workspace}"}],"transformers":null}
